data.prayer: Father, remind your church in City of Freeport that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of City of Freeport, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of City of Freeport, Bahamas to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of City of Freeport.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of City of Freeport to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 10,692 believers in City of Freeport, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of City of Freeport to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in City of Freeport who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of City of Freeport, Bahamas has a population of 27,000.

We estimate City of Freeport has 10,692 people who might know Jesus, 14,812 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,496 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
